oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā kitāb Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn al-Shumunnī ʻalá manẓūmatihi al-musammāh bi-Bughyat al-ṭālib al-ḥathīth fī maʻrifat ʻilm muṣṭalaḥ al-ḥadīth : manuscript, undated
Sharḥ Bughyat al-ṭālib al-ḥathīth fī maʻrifat ʻilm muṣṭalaḥ al-ḥadīth
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn al-Shumunnī, Muḥammad.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to colophon, Manṣūr Handal al-ʻAdawī al-Mālikī copied the book for himself.
Waqf statement (f. 13r): "Waqf lillāh taʻālá ʻalá ahl al-ʻilm bi-al-Azhar wa-maqarruhu Rawāq al-Akrād."
Bound with: Risālah fī bayān maʻná al-tafsīr wa-bayān al-nisbah baynahu wa-bayna al-taʼwīl wa-dhikr mawḍūʻihi wa-ghāyatihi wa-istimdādih / Muḥammad al-Shawbarī.
MS Arab 350. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ibn al-Shumunnī, Muḥammad
Hadith--Terminology
